name: AM01A ALUM. VERTICAL SCREENS
Details
All screens are installed level and as per approved shop drawing and engineer's certificate
All blades have fully welded to bottom flat bar
Any existing scratches have been touched up
Screens are clean and free of any dust and dirt
All bolt fixings were M10 GAL ROD AND DOME NUT MONUMENT, screens were installed as per shop drawing
Chemset used for bolt fixing was VFpro22 + as per shop drawings, bolt min EMBD 100mm
Color of RHS blades is Interpon D2525 Flat Matt Monument as per shops- All touch up paints match the actual powdercoat color
ABL-SHP-0100 REV01 were used for installation on site

INSPECTION WAS DONE MOSTLY VISUALLY ON SITE BY SITE TEAM AND PHOTOS WERE PROVIDED TO PROJECT MANAGER - ON SITE INSPECTION ALSO WAS DONE BY THE PROJECT MANAGER ( MARJAN SOLTANI ) - ANJIE IS RESPONSIBLE TO CHECK ALL THE ABOVE ITEMS REQULARLY ( FORTHNIGHTLY ) TO SIGN OFF ON THE CHEKLIST

BAL01A ALUM, ALUMINIUM HANDRAIL
Details
All handrails are installed level and as per approved shop drawing and engineer's certificate
All vertical fb posts have fully welded to bottom flat bar
Any existing scratches have been touched up
Handrails are clean and free of any dust and dirt
All bolt fixings were M10 GAL ROD AND DOME NUT MONUMENT, handrails were installed as per shop drawing
Chemset used for bolt fixing was VFpro22 + as per shop drawings, bolt min EMBD 80mm
Mid Horizontal 25x3 CHS is welded to 2 vertical FB at both ends and rest of posts, CHS only run through a round hole with no welding
Color of handrail is Interpon D2525 Flat Matt Monument as per shops- All touch up paints match the actual powdercoat color
ABL-SHP-3000 REV03 were used for installation on site

BAL03A ALUM, ALUMINIUM BALUSTRADE
Details
All balustrades are installed level and as per approved shop drawing and engineer's certificate

Balustrades are clean and free of any dust and dirt

ABL-SHP-3100 REV05 ( North & South) and ABL-SHP-0500 REV07 ( West) were used for installation on site
